hard: Lian – Each time Keira will do a basic attack and hit Lian she will be charmed for a few seconds
Helios – when Keira is combined with Jet then Helios is a great counter to Keira because each time Keira will critical strike Helios will deal damage to her
Corvus – when Corvus’ altar is up each Keira’s ricochet hit will trigger damage from Corvus’ altar
soft: Daredevil – Daredevil has a great chance to win against Keira. All goes down to what team compositions each team has. On offense, Daredevil should always win against Keira.
